paper_abstract: This paper deals with the approximation of solutions to a degenerate variational inequality of parabolic type with a non-smooth final condition arising from American option pricing by the piecewise linear finite element method in space and an implicit time-stepping scheme. We show that the error of the approximation in a weighted Sobolev norm is of order O(h2/3+ t1/3) under some realistic regularity assumptions on the exact solution, where h and t denote the mesh parameters in space and time, respectively. Numerical examples are presented to confirm our theoretical results.
paper_title: Convergence of a finite element approximation to a degenerate parabolic variational inequality with non-smooth data arising from American option valuation
